title: 5G Activation Guide
full_details:
1. Go to Settings > Mobile Network.
2. Select SIM Card.
3. Change Preferred Network Type to '5G/4G/LTE (Auto)'.
4. Ensure you have a 5G compatible plan and are in a 5G coverage area.

title: Port to Jio/Airtel (MNP)
highlight: How to switch operator without changing number.
full_details:
1. Send SMS 'PORT <Your Number>' to 1900.
2. You will receive a UPC Code.
3. Visit the nearest store of the new operator with ID proof and the UPC Code.
4. Process takes 3-7 days.

title: Lost SIM Card?
highlight: What to do if you lose your phone/SIM.
full_details:
1. Immediately call Customer Care to block the SIM to prevent misuse.
2. Visit the nearest operator store with ID proof.
3. Request a duplicate SIM (usually costs Rs. 50-100).
4. Services resume within 2-4 hours.

title: Check Balance Codes (USSD)
full_details:
Jio: Call 1299 for SMS.
Airtel: *121#
Vi: *199#
BSNL: *123#

title: DTH Error Codes
full_details:
No Signal: Check weather or dish alignment.
Error 4: Subscription expired.
Error 14: Card not inserted properly.
